casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS AND ADMINISTRATIVE ACTIONS

June 14, 2007

[Cite as 0611412007 Case Announcements, 2007-Ohio-2903.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2006-2302. Bikkani v. Lee.

Cuyahoga App. No. 88650. Upon consideration of Prasad Bikkani’s request for leave to file a motion in opposition to appellees’ bill and documentation of attorney’s fees, costs and expenses,

It is ordered by the court that leave is granted. Bikkani’s motion opposing appellees’ bill and documentation of attorney’s fees, which is attached to his request for leave, shall be considered by the court.
